name: City Garbage truck Driver 3d simulator
description:
Garbage truck simulator

Get to experience this awesome garbage truck simulator game. Get to feel like a real trucker who is driving a big trash truck.
Your mission is to clean the scruff from town. Once you collected all garbage with road sweeper / stinky flatcar drive your dump
gondola to dispose of all the trash in junkyard with road sweeper.

Done with a lot driver parking, rubbish transporter, oil tanker , road sweeper games that offers you just to park your Filth vehicle. This
game is unique with challenging driver mission. Pick up scrap from streets, you will love realistic hauler animation for collecting
rubbish and disposing off in recycling plant.

Download rubbish road sweeper this wonderful in your ios tablet for unlimited fun for youngsters.

Key features:

=> 20 real big city 3d game levels
=> Limited time to pick up the garbage drive the garbage
=> Real life driving and parking experience
=> Amazingly HD realistic graphics with superb background music
=>Show your best extreme truck driving skills
